text.name: function_fieldworkFillStation
text.text: Load up your impliments for all of your contracting gigs, 30% discount for buying bulk!

text.name: function_fieldworkFillStationSilo
text.text: Silo for your farm to store all of your fieldwork supplies.

text.name: function_husbandryFillStation
text.text: Feed your animals without the hassle of farming, 30% discount for buying bulk!

text.name: function_bulkFillStation
text.text: A bit short? Buy any bulk product at a 30% discount!

text.name: function_liquidFillStation
text.text: Fill your tank or tanker, 30% discount for buying bulk!

text.name: function_oldButStillGood
text.text: It may be a bit rusty, but always trusty.

text.name: function_alsoSellStation
text.text: Bought a bit too much? Sell it back right away!
